com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers

Class GalleryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers.GalleryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FController, java.io.Serializable

    public class GalleryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements FController, java.io.Serializable
    Mediates between the GalleryActivity and the DBManager by creating HashMaps of pictures to be displayed in the Gallery View.

    Can be constructed using an album name as a String or a Collection of tags as Strings.

    Author:
    Isaac Matichuk
    See Also:
    DBManager, GalleryActivity, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GalleryManager() 
      GalleryManager(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> tags)
      Constructs the GalleryManager with all Pictures with a set of Tags as opposed to with an Album.
      GalleryManager(java.lang.String albumName)
      Constructs the GalleryManager with an Album of Pictures (or All Pictures) as opposed to Pictures with a set of tags.

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getPhotoGallery()
